mapper.select: select city_id,city ,sum(register_num) as total_register_num ,sum(house_num) as total_house_num ,sum(plan_money) as total_plan_money ,sum(service_commission) as total_service_commission ,sum(product_num) as total_product_num from dapp_operate_city_d where city != '其他' group by city

select YEAR(create_date) as create_date ,city ,sum(register_num) as total_register_num ,sum(house_num) as total_house_num ,sum(plan_money) as total_plan_money ,sum(service_commission) as total_service_commission ,sum(product_num) as total_product_num from fangdb.dapp_operate_city_d where city != '其他' and YEAR(create_date)>='2016' group by YEAR(create_date),city

select rownum ,feechannel_name ,give_money from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum,a.feechannel_name,a.give_money from ( select feechannel_name, sum(give_money) give_money from dapp_feechannel_operate_d group by feechannel_name order by give_money desc ) a, (select @rownum :=0)b ) a where rownum <= 10

select rownum ,feechannel_name ,give_money from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum,a.feechannel_name,a.give_money from ( select feechannel_name, sum(give_money) give_money from dapp_feechannel_operate_d where YEAR(create_date) <= year(date_sub(now(),interval 1 year)) group by feechannel_name order by give_money desc ) a, (select @rownum :=0)b ) a where rownum <= 10

select rownum ,media ,channel_num from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum,a.media,channel_num from ( select media, sum(channel_num) as channel_num from fangdb.dapp_channel_customer_operate_d group by media order by channel_num desc ) a, (select @rownum :=0)b ) a where rownum <= 10

select rownum ,media ,channel_num from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum,a.media,channel_num from ( select media, sum(channel_num) as channel_num from fangdb.dapp_channel_customer_operate_d where YEAR(create_date) <= year(date_sub(now(),interval 1 year)) group by media order by channel_num desc ) a, (select @rownum :=0)b ) a where rownum <= 10

select rownum ,media ,concat(useful_rate,'%') from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum,a.media,useful_rate from ( select media, sum(useful_channel_num)/sum(channel_num)*100 as useful_rate from fangdb.dapp_channel_customer_operate_d group by media HAVING sum(useful_channel_num) >= 500 order by useful_rate desc ) a, (select @rownum :=0)b ) a where rownum <= 10

select rownum ,media ,concat(useful_rate,'%') from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum,a.media,useful_rate from ( select media, sum(useful_channel_num)/sum(channel_num)*100 as useful_rate from fangdb.dapp_channel_customer_operate_d where YEAR(create_date) <= year(date_sub(now(),interval 1 year)) group by media HAVING sum(useful_channel_num) >= 500 order by useful_rate desc ) a, (select @rownum :=0)b ) a where rownum <= 10

select case DAYOFWEEK(create_date) when 1 then '周日' when 2 then '周一' when 3 then '周二' when 4 then '周三' when 5 then '周四' when 6 then '周五' when 7 then '周六' end as dayofweek_name -- 星期几 , ln(sum(service_num)) as service_num -- 注册客户数 ,ln(sum(service_contract_num)) as service_contract_num -- 协议签订数 ,ln(sum(contract_num)) as contract_num -- 放款合同签订数 from fangdb.dapp_operate_d group by DAYOFWEEK(create_date)
select city ,sum(register_num)/10000 as register_num ,sum(plan_money)/10000 as plan_money from fangdb.dapp_operate_city_d where city != '其他' group by city
select sum(register_num)/10000 as register_num -- 注册数 ,sum(plan_money)/10000 as plan_money -- 协议放款额(亿) from fangdb.dapp_operate_city_d

select CONCAT(YEAR(create_date),'年第',quarter(create_date),'季度') as qu -- 分季度 ,sum(service_num)/10000 as service_num -- 服务客户数(万) ,sum(service_commission)/10000 as service_commission -- 协议放款额(亿) from fangdb.dapp_operate_d where create_date>='2016-04-01' GROUP BY qu

select rownum -- 月度排名 ,sub_company_name -- 分公司 ,member_name -- 巴员名称 ,service_contract_num -- 签订协议数 from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum,a.sub_company_name,member_name,a.service_contract_num from ( select sub_company_name, member_name, sum(service_contract_num) as service_contract_num from fangdb.dapp_user_operate_d where quarter(create_date) = quarter( curdate( )) and year(create_date)=year(CURDATE()) group by sub_company_name,member_name order by service_contract_num desc ) a, (select @rownum :=0)b ) a where rownum <= 10

select rownum -- 周排名 ,sub_company_name -- 分公司 ,member_name -- 巴员名称 ,meet_num -- 面见客户数 from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum,a.sub_company_name,member_name,a.meet_num from ( select sub_company_name, member_name, sum(meet_num) as meet_num from fangdb.dapp_user_operate_d where YEARWEEK(create_date) = YEARWEEK(curdate()) group by sub_company_name,member_name order by meet_num desc ) a, (select @rownum :=0)b ) a where rownum <= 10

select rownum -- 日排名 ,sub_company_name -- 分公司 ,member_name -- 巴员名称 ,communicate_num -- 沟通数 from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum,a.sub_company_name,member_name,a.communicate_num from ( select sub_company_name, member_name, sum(communicate_num) as communicate_num from fangdb.dapp_user_operate_d where create_date = curdate() group by sub_company_name,member_name order by communicate_num desc ) a, (select @rownum :=0)b ) a where rownum <= 10

select rownum -- 季度排名 ,sub_company_name -- 分公司 ,member_name -- 巴员名称 ,commission_num -- 收佣数 from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum,a.sub_company_name,member_name,a.commission_num from ( select sub_company_name, member_name, sum(commission_num) as commission_num from fangdb.dapp_user_operate_d where quarter(create_date) = quarter( curdate( )) and year(create_date)=year(CURDATE()) group by sub_company_name,member_name order by commission_num desc,create_date desc ) a, (select @rownum :=0)b ) a where rownum <= 10
